section.86: Limits and Punishments set by Allah (Hudood)

hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha:Abu Bakr came to towards me and struck me violently with his fist and said, "You have detained the people because of your necklace." But I remained motionless as if I was dead lest I should awake Allah's Messenger (ï·º) although that hit was very painful
